mapper.sql: id, providername, zip, address, telephone, connectionperson, phone, bank, account, email, fax, available

id,
providername,
zip,
address,
telephone,
connectionperson,
phone,
bank,

email,
fax,
available,

mapper.update:
update bus_provider
providername = #{providername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
connectionperson = #{connectionperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bus_provider set providername = #{providername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, connectionperson = #{connectionperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from bus_provider
and providername like concat("%",#{providername},"%")
and phone like concat("%",#{phone},"%")
and connectionperson like concat("%",#{connectionperson},"%")
and available like concat("%",#{available},"%")
